Lake Park Community High School District 108 / Homepage

a.title: Return to the homepage on the district site.

span.p: Lake Park High School buildings are CLOSED based on Governor Pritzker's response to the COVID-19 pandemic. All activities and events at the campuses are cancelled through the remainder of the school year. For questions or concerns, call (630) 529-3003 or visit www.lphs.org/COVID19 regularly for new info as it becomes available. Please stay healthy & safe!

a.title: Go to comments for LPHS School Closure: March 13-June 4, 2020
